body:
Haven't recorded on the server in a while. So here's a brief quality test for recording. Not really much to say but just give me feedback on the quality, my crappy aim, or anything else I can improve on.

Thanks ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ ☯ (づ｡◕‿‿◕｡)づ ☯ (• ε •) ♥‿♥ 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Hj5dUehBBw&feature=youtu.be

Note: Didn't record this in full screen so I could get better FPS. 
Also note: Goodbye montage coming very soon.
